pullRequest.title: HBASE-25365 The log in move_servers_rsgroup is incorrect

nodes.bodyText: nit: 'server' in the log message is redundant; we are always moving between servers?
Why not say, 'All regions from {} moved from {} to {}, movedServerNames, sourceGroupName, targetGroupName?
